scripts.prep: npx typings install && npx copyfiles analytics.js dist && npx catw node_modules/material-design-lite/material.min.js node_modules/d3/d3.min.js node_modules/seedrandom/seedrandom.min.js > dist/lib.js
scripts.build-js: npx browserify src/playground.ts --lib dom,es2015 -p [tsify] | npx uglify-js -c > dist/bundle.js
scripts.build-extra-files: mkdir -p dist/images; cp images/* dist/images/; mkdir -p dist/datasets; cp datasets/* dist/datasets/; mkdir -p dist/files; cp files/* dist/files/
scripts.build: npm run prep && npm run build-images && npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-html
scripts.watch: npm run prep && concurrently "npm run watch-extra-files" "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-html"
scripts.serve-watch: npx concurrently "npx live-server dist/" "npm run watch"
scripts.doall: npm run clean; npm run build; cp src/capacityreq.py dist/; npm run serve-watch
scripts.dobuild: npm run clean; npm run build
scripts.dowww: npm run clean; npm run build; cp src/capacityreq.py dist/; sudo cp dist/* /var/www/html/; sudo cp preview.png /var/www/html/
scripts.dowwwtest: npm run clean; npm run build; sudo cp -R dist/* /var/www/html/test/; sudo cp preview.png /var/www/html/test/
scripts.dowwwent: npm run clean; npm run build; sudo cp -R dist/* /var/www/html/enterprise/; sudo cp preview.png /var/www/html/enterprise/
